sen.j: 三雲 成持（みくも しげもち、天文 (元号)9年（1540年） - 慶長8年（1603年））は、戦国時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: Shigemochi MIKUMO (1540 - 1603) was a military commander of the Sengoku (warring states) period.

sen.e: Initially Shigemochi took service with the Rokkaku clan, a daimyo in the Sengoku period in the southern Omi Province.

sen.e: He took over the family estate in 1566 as his elder brother Katamochi MIKUMO died in the battle against Nagamasa ASAI.

sen.e: It appears, however, that Shigemochi was an influential figure for the Rokkaku clan, being what should be called as an ally rather than a vassal.

sen.j: 1568年、織田信長の侵攻で六角氏が滅亡した後は浪人となったが、1584年頃に織田信雄、そして蒲生氏郷に仕えた。
sen.e: After the fall of the Rokkaku clan in 1568 due to the invasion by Nobunaga ODA, Shigemochi became a ronin (a lordless samurai), but in around 1584 he took service with Nobukatsu ODA and then with Ujisato GAMO.
